title: Melania Trump and Usha Vance meet military families in first joint visit
text:
First Lady Melania Trump and Second Lady Usha Vance met with military families in Camp Lejeune in their first joint visit together.

The military base in North Carolina houses training and operations for the US Marine Corps.

Trump and Vance spoke with troops and met children of service members attending school on the camp.

The visit was scheduled ahead of the upcoming Thanksgiving holiday.
